title.narrative: B2B Virmegraf and Tørring Bogtrykkeri-Northlander. Outsourcing of printing.

description.narrative: The vision is to form a digital outsourcing industry in Bolivia. The goal of the project is to establish a 100% digitally based production unit at Virmegraf in Cochabamba Bolivia, able to produce pre-press and internet products of a quality high enough to receive outsourcing jobs from the Danish partners and, on longer perspective, also from other companies in Northern European market. The production unit will primarily be related to the production of newspapers, advertisements and web production (websites, newspapers on the internet). The project objective is to establish a digital and internet based graphics outsourcing unit, building up qualified production capacity in Bolivia. An attractive working environment will be created in the outsourcing unit, to serve an export market initially to Denmark.
